programme.title: Gorillas in the Mist
programme.desc: Biographical drama starring Sigourney Weaver. Dian Fossey arrives in central Africa full of high ideals and a passion for nature, determined to research rare mountain gorillas faced with extinction. Over the coming years she builds a strong bond with the powerful animals, but tragedy is never far away Michael Apted - Director, Michael Apted - Director Sigourney Weaver - Dian Fossey Bryan Brown - Bob Campbell Julie Harris (2) - Roz Carr John Omirah Miluwi - Sembagare Iain Cuthbertson - Dr Louis Leakey Constantin Alexandrov - Van Vecten Waigwa Wachira - Mukara Iain Glen - Brendan David Lansbury - Larry Maggie O'Neill - Kim Konga Mbandu - Rushemba Michael J Reynolds - Howard Dowd Sigourney Weaver - Dian Fossey Bryan Brown - Bob Campbell Julie Harris (2) - Roz Carr John Omirah Miluwi - Sembagare Iain Cuthbertson - Dr Louis Leakey Constantin Alexandrov - Van Vecten Waigwa Wachira - Mukara Iain Glen - Brendan David Lansbury - Larry Maggie O'Neill - Kim Konga Mbandu - Rushemba Michael J Reynolds - Howard Dowd.

programme.title: The Terminal
programme.desc: Comedy drama directed by Steven Spielberg, starring Tom Hanks and Catherine Zeta-Jones. On a visit to the United States from the eastern European state of Krakozhia, Viktor Navorski suddenly finds himself with no legal status after his country falls to a military coup. Without a valid visa or diplomatic status, the hapless Navorski is therefore confined to JFK airport, much to the irritation of US customs official Frank Dixon who is determined to be rid of the unwanted visitor Steven Spielberg - Director, Steven Spielberg - Director Tom Hanks - Viktor Navorski Catherine Zeta-Jones - Amelia Warren Stanley Tucci - Frank Dixon Chi McBride - Joe Mulroy Diego Luna - Enrique Cruz Barry \Shabaka\ Henley - Ray Thurman Kumar Pallana - Gupta Rajan Zoë Saldana - Dolores Torres Eddie Jones - Salchak Jude Ciccolella - Karl Iverson Corey Reynolds - Waylin Guillermo Diaz - Bobby Alima Tom Hanks - Viktor Navorski Catherine Zeta-Jones - Amelia Warren Stanley Tucci - Frank Dixon Chi McBride - Joe Mulroy Diego Luna - Enrique Cruz Barry \Shabaka\ Henley - Ray Thurman Kumar Pallana - Gupta Rajan Zoë Saldana - Dolores Torres Eddie Jones - Salchak Jude Ciccolella - Karl Iverson Corey Reynolds - Waylin Guillermo Diaz - Bobby Alima.

programme.desc: Comedy adventure starring Rowan Atkinson, and featuring John Malkovich. programme.title: Transformers: Rise Of The Beasts
programme.sub-title: Action, Fantasy, War, Drama, Sci Fi ║ 2023 ║ 12A
programme.desc: In 1994 New York City, ex-serviceman Noah Diaz accepts a job from neighbourhood chancer Reek to steal a sports car. The high-end vehicle turns out to be robot-in-disguise Mirage, who propels Noah into the midst of a hunt for a precious Transwarp key. The device will allow Autobot leader Optimus Prime and his mechanised compatriots to return home to Cybertron. programme.title: Ferrari
programme.desc: During the summer of 1957, ex-racecar driver Enzo Ferrari is in crisis. Bankruptcy stalks the company he and his wife, Laura, built from nothing a decade earlier. Their tempestuous marriage struggles with the mourning for one son and the acknowledgement of another. Attempting to secure their survival, he rolls the dice on one race - 1,000 miles across Italy, the iconic Mille Miglia. programme.title: I Now Pronounce You Chuck & Larry
programme.desc: Comedy starring Adam Sandler and Kevin James. When widowed New York firefighter Larry Valentine is told that he can't name his children as life assurance beneficiaries unless he remarries, he asks devoted colleague and serial womaniser Chuck to pose as his civil partner. programme.title: The King's Speech
programme.desc: Oscar-winning historical drama starring Colin Firth, Helena Bonham Carter and Geoffrey Rush. As part of his royal duties, Prince Albert is required to speak at public events, a task made all the more difficult owing to his severe stammer. The death of his father and subsequent abdication of his older brother means that "Bertie" is to be crowned king. programme.title: Erin Brockovich
programme.desc: Oscar-winning biographical drama starring Julia Roberts. When she loses a lawsuit following a car accident, unemployed single mother Erin Brockovich browbeats her lawyer, Ed Masry, into giving her a job. Soon she discovers that a power company has been dumping toxic waste and poisoning the residents of a small town. programme.title: The Colour Room
programme.desc: Period drama telling the story of Clarice Cliff, who broke the glass ceiling and helped revolutionise the workplace in the 20th century. Clarice is a vivacious young factory worker in the industrial British midlands of the 1920s. Bursting with ideas for colours and shapes, she takes more and more dangerous risks, but manages to stay one step ahead of the workhouse and impress eccentric factory owner Colley Shorter with her talent and innovation. programme.title: Golda
programme.desc: In October 1973, Israeli Prime Minister Golda Meir initially refuses to act on intelligence that suggests Egypt and Syria intend to launch a co-ordinated military offensive against Israel. Eventually the attacks begin, catching Minister of Defence Moshe Dayan off guard. Meir refuses to accept his resignation and a weakened Dayan leads the Israeli response, which requires Meir to request air support from US Secretary of State, Henry Kissinger. programme.desc: Young, uptight and unsuccessful English writer Henry's latest novel sells poorly. programme.title: Book of Love
programme.desc: Young, uptight and unsuccessful English writer Henry's latest novel sells poorly. But when the book suddenly becomes a surprise hit in Mexico, his publicist insists he travel there on a promotional tour. Upon arrival, a confused Henry discovers the reason behind the popularity - Mexican translator Maria has rewritten the dull book as a steamy erotic story. A furious Henry and reluctant Maria must now travel together on a book tour across Mexico. As tempers flair and sparks fly, the two begin to find love. Romantic comedy, starring Sam Claflin and Veronica Echegui Robert Shaye - Director, Robert Shaye - Director, Robert Shaye - Director, Robert Shaye - Director.

programme.title: The Smurfs 2
programme.sub-title: Comedy, Family, Fantasy, Drama, Action, Animation, Children's ║ 2013 ║ U
programme.desc: Part-animated comedy starring Neil Patrick Harris. programme.title: The Best of The 2024 IPL

programme.desc: Super Bowl LVIII comes from Las Vegas as the San Francisco 49ers and the Kansas City Chiefs set up a repeat of Super Bowl 54. The Chiefs are aiming to become back-to-back champions. (11.02).

programme.title: Best Of NFL 23/24
programme.desc: Hosting their first playoff game since 1993, Detroit meet the Rams and a returning Matthew Stafford in the wild-card round. The two have only met once in the playoffs, back in 1952. (14.01).

programme.title: Fight Night: Rozanski v Okolie
programme.desc: The WBC world bridgerweight championship is on the line as Lawrence Okolie makes his long-awaited return to challenge Lukasz Rozanski at the Podpromie Arena in Rzeszow, Poland. (24.05).

programme.title: Fight Night: McCaskill v Price
programme.desc: Challenging Jessica McCaskill for the WBA and WBC welterweight titles, Lauren Price makes her Wales homecoming at Cardiff's Utilita Arena in her first-ever world title fight. (11.05).

programme.title: S/Lge: Catalans v Warrington Hlts
programme.desc: Unbeaten at home, Catalans Dragons host Warrington Wolves in the Betfred Super League. Third-placed Warrington take back-to-back league wins to the south of France. (25.05).

programme.title: S/Lge: Catalans v Leeds Hlts
programme.desc: Catalans Dragons face Leeds Rhinos in the Betfred Super League. The Rhinos take a home win over the Broncos to the south of France, as the Catalans try to respond after defeat. (11.05).

programme.title: WS/Lge: St Helens v Leeds Hlts
programme.desc: Action from the Betfred Women's Super League, as St Helens and Leeds Rhinos clash at the Totally Wicked Stadium. After three played, it's Leeds Rhinos who boast the perfect record. (24.05).

programme.title: S/Lge: St Helens v Leeds Hlts
programme.desc: St Helens host Leeds Rhinos in the Betfred Super League. The Saints were in rampant mood during round 11's clash with Castleford, pulling off an incredible 4-60 victory. (24.05).

programme.title: Fight Night
programme.desc: San Diego sees the crowning of a new WBO lightweight champion, as Emanuel Navarrete and Denys Berinchyk go one on one for the vacant title. (19.05).

programme.title: Best Of NFL 23/24
programme.desc: Fresh from sending the Bills home in the divisional round, Patrick Mahomes and the Kansas City Chiefs return to the AFC championship game as they face the Ravens in Baltimore. (28.01).

programme.title: Best Of NFL 23/24
programme.desc: The San Francisco 49ers and the Detroit Lions advance to the NFC Championship game with a Super Bowl LVIII bid on the line. Can the Lions keep their storybook season going here? (28.01).

programme.desc: Mike Florio and Chris Simms present this NFL talk show, as they discuss and debate the biggest stories from around the league.

programme.desc: The WBC world bridgerweight championship is on the line as Lawrence Okolie makes his long-awaited return to challenge Lukasz Rozanski at the Podpromie Arena in Rzeszow, Poland. (24.05).

programme.title: Best Of NFL 23/24
programme.desc: The final matchup in the NFL's wild-card round pits the Tampa Bay Buccaneers up against Jalen Hurts and the Eagles. The two are meeting for the sixth time during the postseason. (15.01).

programme.title: LIVE: Live: Investec Champions Cup
programme.sub-title: S2023E63 ║ Live: Leinster Rugby v Toulouse ║ Sport
programme.desc: Leinster v Toulouse (Kick-off 2.45pm). Coverage of the final, which takes place at Tottenham Hotspur Stadium. Both sides have featured in the final at least once in the last three years, with Leinster appearing on the last two occasions. The Irish side have lost the last two finals against La Rochelle, so will be hoping it is third time lucky this time around. Toulouse beat La Rochelle in their last appearance in a final in 2021, when they came out on top with a 22-17 victory.
